verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David רִיבָ֣ה <WH7378> ri-Vah Plead יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh [my cause] O LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרִיבַ֑י <WH3401> ye-ri-Vai; with them that strive לְ֝חַ֗ם <WH3898> le-Cham, with me fight אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לֹֽחֲמָֽי׃ <WH3898> Lo-cha-Mai. against them that fight

הַחֲזֵ֣ק <WH2388> ha-cha-Zek Take hold מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> ma-Gen of shield וְצִנָּ֑ה <WH6793> ve-tzin-Nah; and buckler וְ֝ק֗וּמָה <WH6965> ve-Ku-mah, and stand up בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃ <WH5833> be-'ez-ra-Ti. for mine help

וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק <WH7324> ve-Ha-Rek Draw out חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> cha-Nit also the spear וּ֭סְגֹר <WH5462> U-se-gor and stop לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> lik-Rat [the way] against רֹדְפָ֑י <WH7291> ro-de-Fai; them that persecute אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> 'e-Mor me say לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> le-naf-Shi, unto my soul יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Tech I [am] thy salvation אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> 'A-ni. I

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu Let them be confounded וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ <WH3637> ve-yik-kal-Mu and put to shame מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <WH1245> me-vak-Shei that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <WH5472> yis-So-gu let them be turned אָח֣וֹר <WH268> a-Chor back וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ <WH2659> ve-yach-pe-Ru; and brought to confusion חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י <WH2803> cho-she-Vei, that devise רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> ra-'a-Ti. my hurt

יִֽהְי֗וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu, them be like כְּמֹ֥ץ <WH4671> ke-Motz Let them be as chaff לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> lif-nei- before ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach; the wind וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ <WH4397> u-mal-'Ach and let the angel יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD דּוֹחֶֽה׃ <WH1760> do-Cheh. chase

יְֽהִי־ <WH1961> ye-hi- Let דַרְכָּ֗ם <WH1870> dar-Kam, Let their way חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech be dark וַחֲלַקְלַקּ֑וֹת <WH2519> va-cha-lak-lak-Kot; and slippery וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> u-mal-'Ach and let the angel יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD רֹדְפָֽם׃ <WH7291> ro-de-Fam. persecute

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For חִנָּ֣ם <WH2600> chin-Nam For without cause טָֽמְנוּ־ <WH2934> ta-me-nu- have they hid לִ֭י li שַׁ֣חַת <WH7845> Sha-chat [in] a pit רִשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH7568> rish-Tam; for me their net חִ֝נָּ֗ם <WH2600> chin-Nam, [which] without cause חָפְר֥וּ <WH2658> cha-fe-Ru they have digged לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> le-naf-Shi. for my soul

תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ <WH935> te-vo-'E-hu come שׁוֹאָה֮ <WH7722> sho-'Ah Let destruction לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יֵ֫דָ֥ע <WH3045> ye-Da' acknowledge וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH7568> ve-rish-To and let his net אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which טָמַ֣ן <WH2934> ta-Man that he hath hid תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ <WH3920> til-ke-Do; catch בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה <WH7722> be-sho-'Ah, himself into that very destruction יִפָּל־ <WH5307> yip-pol- let him fall בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <WH5315> Ve-naf-shi And my soul תָּגִ֣יל <WH1523> ta-Gil shall be joyful בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD תָּ֝שִׂישׂ <WH7797> Ta-sis it shall rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> bi-shu-'a-To. in his salvation

כָּ֥ל <WH3605> kal All עַצְמוֹתַ֨י׀ <WH6106> atz-mo-Tai All my bones תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ <WH559> to-mar-Nah shall say יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD מִ֥י <WH4310> mi who כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ <WH3644> cha-Mo-cha is like מַצִּ֣יל <WH5337> matz-Tzil who [is] like unto thee which deliverest עָ֭נִי <WH6041> 'A-ni the poor מֵחָזָ֣ק <WH2389> me-cha-Zak from him that is too strong מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu; is too וְעָנִ֥י <WH6041> ve-'a-Ni for him yea the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <WH34> ve-'ev-Yon, and the needy מִגֹּזְלֽוֹ׃ <WH1497> mig-go-ze-Lo. from him that spoileth

יְ֭קוּמוּן <WH6965> Ye-ku-mun did rise up עֵדֵ֣י <WH5707> 'e-Dei witnesses חָמָ֑ס <WH2555> cha-Mas; FALSE אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti, [things] that I knew יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃ <WH7592> yish-'a-Lu-ni. they laid to my charge

יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי <WH7999> ye-shal-le-Mu-ni They rewarded רָ֭עָה <WH7451> Ra-'ah me evil תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash טוֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> to-Vah, for good שְׁכ֣וֹל <WH7908> she-Chol [to] the spoiling לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> le-naf-Shi. of my soul

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni Me בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם <WH2470> ba-cha-lo-Tam But as for me when they were sick לְב֬וּשִׁי <WH3830> le-Vu-shi my clothing שָׂ֗ק <WH8242> Sak, [was] sackcloth עִנֵּ֣יתִי <WH6031> 'in-Nei-ti I humbled בַצּ֣וֹם <WH6685> vatz-Tzom with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; my soul וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <WH8605> u-te-fil-la-Ti, and my prayer עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto חֵיקִ֥י <WH2436> chei-Ki into mine own bosom תָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> ta-Shuv. returned

כְּרֵֽעַ־ <WH7453> ke-re-a'- myself as though [he had been] my friend כְּאָ֣ח <WH251> ke-'Ach [or] brother לִ֭י li הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> hit-hal-La-che-ti; I behaved כַּאֲבֶל־ <WH57> ka-'a-vel- as one that mourneth אֵ֝֗ם <WH517> 'Em, [for his] mother קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> ko-Der heavily שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃ <WH7817> sha-Cho-ti. I bowed down

וּבְצַלְעִי֮ <WH6761> u-ve-tzal-'I But in mine adversity שָׂמְח֪וּ <WH8055> sa-me-Chu they rejoiced וְֽנֶאֱ֫סָ֥פוּ <WH622> ve-ne-'E-Sa-fu and gathered themselves together נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ <WH622> ne-'es-Fu gathered themselves together עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai against נֵ֭כִים <WH5222> Ne-chim [yea] the abjects וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo without יָדַ֑עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti; against me and I knew קָֽרְע֥וּ <WH7167> ka-re-'U [it] not they did tear וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- without דָֽמּוּ׃ <WH1826> Dam-mu. [me] and ceased

בְּ֭חַנְפֵי <WH2611> Be-chan-fei With hypocritical לַעֲגֵ֣י <WH3934> la-'a-Gei mockers מָע֑וֹג <WH4580> ma-'og; in feasts חָרֹ֖ק <WH2786> cha-Rok they gnashed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai with שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃ <WH8127> shin-Nei-mov. upon me with their teeth

אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Lord כַּמָּ֪ה <WH4100> kam-Mah how תִּ֫רְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> tir-'Eh how long wilt thou look on הָשִׁ֣יבָה <WH7725> ha-Shi-vah ;rescue נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi my soul מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7722> mish-sho-'ei-Hem; from their destructions מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים <WH3715> mik-ke-fi-Rim, from the lions יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <WH3173> ye-chi-da-Ti. my darling

א֭וֹדְךָ <WH3034> od-cha I will give thee thanks בְּקָהָ֣ל <WH6951> be-ka-Hal congregation רָ֑ב <WH7227> Rav; in the great בְּעַ֖ם <WH5971> be-'Am people עָצ֣וּם <WH6099> 'a-Tzum thee among much אֲהַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <WH1984> 'a-Hal-Le-ka. I will praise אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> yis-me-chu- cheer up

לִ֣י li אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai Let not them that are mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> She-ker; wrongfully שֹׂנְאַ֥י <WH8130> so-ne-'Ai that hate חִ֝נָּ֗ם <WH2600> chin-Nam, me without a cause יִקְרְצוּ־ <WH7169> yik-re-tzu- over me [neither] let them wink עָֽיִן׃ <WH5869> 'A-yin. with the eye

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, not peace יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ <WH1696> ye-Dab-Be-ru For they speak וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> ve-'Al against רִגְעֵי־ <WH7282> rig-'ei- against [them that are] quiet אֶ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz; in the land דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei matters מִ֝רְמוֹת <WH4820> Mir-mot deceitful יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃ <WH2803> ya-cha-sho-Vun. but they devise

וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <WH7337> vai-yar-Chi-vu wide עָלַ֗י <WH5921> 'a-Lai, against פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH6310> pi-Hem Yea they opened their mouth אָ֭מְרוּ <WH559> 'A-me-ru against me [and] said הֶאָ֣ח׀ <WH1889> he-'Ach Aha הֶאָ֑ח <WH1889> he-'Ach; aha רָאֲתָ֥ה <WH7200> ra-'a-Tah hath seen עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-nu. our eye

רָאִ֣יתָה <WH7200> ra-'I-tah [This] thou hast seen יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ <WH2790> te-che-Rash; keep not silence אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, O Lord אֲל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּרְחַ֥ק <WH7368> tir-Chak be not far מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. at

הָעִ֣ירָה <WH5782> ha-'I-rah Stir up וְ֭הָקִיצָה <WH6974> Ve-ha-ki-tzah thyself and awake לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <WH4941> le-mish-pa-Ti; to my judgment אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai my God וַֽאדֹנָ֣י <WH136> va-do-Nai and my Lord לְרִיבִֽי׃ <WH7379> le-ri-Vi. [even] unto my cause

שָׁפְטֵ֣נִי <WH8199> sha-fe-Te-ni Judge כְ֭צִדְקְךָ <WH6664> Che-tzid-ke-cha according to thy righteousness יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֗י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai, my God וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> yis-me-chu- and let them not rejoice לִֽי׃ Li.

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru Let them not say בְ֭לִבָּם <WH3820> Ve-lib-bom in their hearts הֶאָ֣ח <WH1889> he-'Ach Ah נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <WH5315> naf-She-nu; so would we have it אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru, let them not say בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃ <WH1104> Bil-la-'a-Nu-hu. We have swallowed him up

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ׀ <WH2659> ve-yach-pe-Ru and brought to confusion יַחְדָּו֮ <WH3162> yach-Dav together שְׂמֵחֵ֪י <WH8056> se-me-Chei that rejoice רָעָ֫תִ֥י <WH7451> ra-'A-Ti at mine hurt יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH3847> yil-be-shu- let them be clothed בֹ֥שֶׁת <WH1322> Vo-shet with shame וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <WH3639> u-che-lim-Mah; and dishonour הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים <WH1431> ham-mag-di-Lim that magnify עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. over

יָרֹ֣נּוּ <WH7442> ya-Ron-nu Let them shout for joy וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ <WH8055> ve-yis-me-Chu and be glad חֲפֵצֵ֪י <WH2655> cha-fe-Tzei that favour צִ֫דְקִ֥י <WH6664> tzid-Ki my righteous cause וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> ve-yo-me-Ru yea let them say תָ֭מִיד <WH8548> Ta-mid continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> yig-Dal be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; Let the LORD הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ <WH2655> he-cha-Fetz, which hath pleasure שְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> she-Lom in the prosperity עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5650> av-Do. of his servant

וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <WH3956> U-le-sho-ni And my tongue תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> teh-Geh shall speak צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <WH6664> tzid-Ke-cha; of thy righteousness כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַ֝יּוֹם <WH3117> Hai-yom all the day תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> te-hil-la-Te-cha. [and] of thy praise
